1: <mistake>@@//gnas//sra</mistake> ba'i <mistake>sind+ge</mistake> <mistake>zhub</mistake> pa <mistake>med //kun</mistake> du lta ba mchog tu <mistake>dga'//gzi</mistake> brjid phreng ldan blta <mistake>na</mistake> <mistake>sdug /pod</mistake> <mistake>bzang</mistake> 'bar ba <mistake>dapal</mistake> gyi <mistake>ba'u//snang</mistake> ba gsal bar byed pa'i <mistake>'od/</mistake>
2: sman pa che mchog <mistake>gtso</mistake> bo <mistake>ste//zug</mistake> <mistake>ru</mistake> 'byin pa bla <mistake>na</mistake> <mistake>med//sman</mistake> rnams ma lus <mistake>ldon</mistake> <mistake>pa'i</mistake> <mistake>shing//nyon</mistake> mongs nad kyi dgra che <mistake>ba // sug</mistake> gu 'jig rten gsum gyi <mistake>mchog /dpal</mistake> ldan rgyu skar dkyil <mistake>'khor</mistake>
3: <mistake>can//phyogs</mistake> bcu nam <mistake>mkha'i</mistake> mthar thug <mistake>pa//chos</mistake> kyi rgyal mtshan chen po <mistake>bsgreng//'gro</mistake> ba'i gdugs gcig yangs <mistake>pa</mistake> ste // byams dang snying <mistake>rje'i</mistake> dkyil 'khor <mistake>can// dpal</mistake> ldan pad+ma <mistake>gar</mistake> dbang
4: <mistake>phyug /khyab</mistake> bdag chen po rin <mistake>ced</mistake> <mistake>gdugs//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi rgyal po <mistake>che//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun bdag <mistake>da ngos</mistake> po <mistake>'dzin//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi rnal <mistake>'byog</mistake> <mistake>che//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi bstan pa <mistake>gcig//</mistake>
5: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur <mistake>dpal// rin</mistake> chen kun bdag dbang phyug <mistake>ste//'jig</mistake> rten dbang <mistake>phyag</mistake> kun gyi <mistake>bdag /rdo</mistake> rje kun <mistake>'cang</mistake> mnga' bdag <mistake>ste//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi <mistake>thugs</mistake> <mistake>cshe</mistake> <mistake>ba//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun
6: gyi thugs la <mistake>gnas//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi sku che <mistake>ba//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi <mistake>mtso</mistake> dang <mistake>ldan//rdo</mistake> rje nyi ma snang ba <mistake>che// rdo</mistake> rje zla ba dri med <mistake>'od//chags</mistake> bral dang <mistake>po</mistake> chags pa <mistake>che//kha</mistake> dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i
7: <mistake>'od//rdo</mistake> rje skyil <mistake>dkrung</mistake> rdzogs <mistake>sangs</mistake> <mistake>rgyas//sangs</mistake> rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin <mistake>pa// dpal</mistake> ldan <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas pad+ma <mistake>skyes//kun</mistake> mkhyen ye shes mdzod <mistake>'dzi</mistake> <mistake>pa// rgyal</mistake> <mistake>bo</mistake> <mistake>sgya</mistake> 'phrul sna tshogs <mistake>'chang</mistake>
8: <mistake>/che</mistake> <mistake>b</mistake> <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas rig pa <mistake>'chang//rdo</mistake> rje <mistake>rnaon</mistake> po ral gri <mistake>che//rnam</mistake> par dag pa 'gyur med mchog / theg pa chen po sdug <mistake>bsngal</mistake> <mistake>gcod//mtshon</mistake> cha chen po rdo rje <mistake>chos//rdo</mistake> rje zab mo <mistake>dzo ni</mistake> <mistake>dzig /rdo</mistake> rje blo gros
